item.title: SONOCO PRODUCTS CO 10-K
item.description: SONOCO PRODUCTS CO, which is in the Paperboard Containers & Boxes [2650] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 28, 2023 had 40478 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 640 instances 2022 - 578 instances financial - 339 instances 2021 - 317 instances december - 309 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
